managers

Class CampamentsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.CampamentsManager

  • public class CampamentsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages operations related to campaments, activities, and monitors in the system, including creation and association.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CampamentsManager()

      • createActivity

        public void createActivity(java.util.ArrayList<Activity> activities,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           Level level,
                           Schendule schendule,
                           int max_participants,
                           int num_monitors)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new activity and adds it to the list of activities.
        Parameters:
        activities - The list of activities.
        name - The name of the activity.
        level - The level of the activity.
        schendule - The schedule of the activity.
        max_participants - The maximum number of participants for the activity.
        num_monitors - The number of monitors for the activity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createMonitor

        public void createMonitor(java.util.ArrayList<Monitor> monitors,
                          int id,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String surname,
                          boolean isEspecial)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new monitor and adds it to the list of monitors.
        Parameters:
        monitors - The list of monitors.
        id - The ID of the monitor.
        name - The name of the monitor.
        surname - The surname of the monitor.
        isEspecial - Whether the monitor is a special needs monitor (true/false).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Creates a new campament and adds it to the list of campaments.
        Parameters:
        campaments - The list of campaments.
        id - The ID of the campament.
        initDate - The start date of the campament.
        finalDate - The end date of the campament.
        level - The level of the campament.

        java.lang.Exception

                                          java.util.ArrayList<Monitor> monitors,

                                          Activity activity)
        Associates a monitor with an activity, if possible.
        Parameters:
        activities - The list of activities.
        monitors - The list of monitors.
        selectedMonitorIndex - The index of the selected monitor.
        activity - The activity to associate with the monitor.

        Associates an activity with a campament.
        Parameters:
        campaments - The list of campaments.
        activities - The list of activities.
        selectedActivityIndex - The index of the selected activity.
        selectedCampament - The campament to associate the activity with.

        monitors - The list of monitors.
        selectedMonitorIndex - The index of the selected monitor.
